  solution:
    js: |-
      const katya = {
        toppings: 'pepperoni',
        price: 15.99,
        size: 'medium'
      }
      const leo = {
        size: 'medium',
        toppings: 'pepperoni',
        price: 15.99
      }

      let same = true
      for (const key in katya) {
        if (katya[key] !== leo[key]) {
          same = false
        }
      }

      console.log({ same })
